item.description:
Ok if you havent eaten enough at the last event..then its time for more..

I love this stuff..

anyway..


Where:
Jill's House
51 Bruce Avenue
Oakville , CT 06779

Info/Map This venue has been marked "private" by the Organizer.
Description:
BE THERE OR BE SQUARE!!!

Member Jill is hosting a potluck picnic at her house. Please bring a small dish of your favorite food item to share. Also bring your favorite beverage. Lawn chairs too. If the weather is good, we'll play volleyball and badminton. The picnic will be held indoors if it rains, so bring your favorite game then.

Hope you all can make it!

ONLY 40 mins from Hartford!

Driving directions from Hartford:
I 84 W toward Waterbury. Merge onto Rte 8 via exit 20 headed North toward Torrington. Then take exit 37 off Rte 8.
Take a Left off exit. You will go thru one set of lites. At the second light take a Right onto Rte 262 (Buckingham St).
About a mile up Buckingham St. is a flashing yellow lite. Take a Left at the light onto Nova Scotia Hill Rd.
Take the first Left off of Nova Scotia Hill Rd. onto Beach Avenue.
Bruce St is the first Right off of Beach Avenue.

AL's comment...good direction Jill,
I wont even have to use the gps...

Ok everyone..bring something good...
Im making my shrimp, garlick, olive oil, and st louis spice dish...

Yes i know some of you alredy responded on Linda's group listing..
you can here too..im not counting..i will see you there...
al-r

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Pot Luck Dinner at Jill's
